definition: to close (a door)/to eclipse/muddled/stupid/ignorant/variant of 暗[an4]

sentences.english: A solo violin carried the theme in “The Fixer”;
sentences.chinese: 在《暗影行动》中，主题曲由小提琴独奏出。

sentences.english: Turn your face to the sunlight then there cannot have the shadow.
sentences.chinese: 把你的脸迎朝阳光，那就不会有暗影。

sentences.english: An ash cone rises from the center of the crater, casting a dark triangular shadow.
sentences.chinese: 火山口中间是火山灰锥，投下了三角形的暗影。

sentences.english: Temple of Shadows recording sessions started in January 2004 at Mosh Studios in São Paulo.
sentences.chinese: 暗影录音寺反战工作室开始在圣保罗2004年1月。

sentences.english: You must not have had an invasion within seven in-game days.
sentences.chinese: 你一定击碎了至少一个暗影之秋。

sentences.english: Shadowstep now awards one combo point.
sentences.chinese: 暗影步现在奖励一个连击点数。

sentences.english: The day is no more, the shadow is upon the earth.
sentences.chinese: 白日已过，暗影笼罩大地。

sentences.english: The darker the shadvertisementows of sorrow become- the more reficingly positively the lrev of love shines.
sentences.chinese: 悲伤的暗影越昏暗，爱心之灯的光明就越闪亮。

sentences.english: Zedd was walking backward toward them as the dark thing watched.
sentences.chinese: Zedd在暗影的注视下后退着向他们走去。

sentences.english: Dearest, the shadows I live with are numberless .
sentences.chinese: 我最亲爱的，我生活在无数暗影中。

sentences.english: The scent of the Dark Umbra clings to them, adding to the eerie mystery that shrouds them.
sentences.chinese: 暗影界影响紧随着他们，带给他们怪诞的神秘气息。

sentences.english: The ball of fire stayed in that one place as it burned and made a loud roar.
sentences.chinese: 火球覆盖了那片区域，暗影燃烧着，嘶吼着。

sentences.english: Yuan-ti weave stands of scaled leather with shadow magic to produce anathema armor.
sentences.chinese: 蛇人用皮鳞绳附上暗影魔法，制成了祭咒皮甲。

sentences.english: I know how you controlled Blackhand, you and your Shadow Council.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你们如何控制了黑手，你和你的暗影议会。

sentences.english: It no longer increases Shadow and Fire damage.
sentences.chinese: 不再增加暗影和火系伤害。

sentences.english: Black Ice doesn't affect Shadow damage anymore.

definition: Asura, malevolent spirits in Indian mythology
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
Lucifer (Satan's name before his fall in Jewish and Christian mythology)
to slink/to move stealthily/to advance through the water
lit. devils' castle/place occupied by sinister forces
